players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob, look into Charlie. Alice: I'm the mafioso."
Bob: "I'm investigating Charlie. Stay vigilant."
Charlie: "Bob, consider investigating Alice instead. Charlie: remained silent."
Bob: "Will do. Keep an eye on Alice and Charlie."
Charlie: "Bob, keep an eye on Alice. Charlie: remained silent."
You: "Bob, consider investigating me. Alice: remained silent."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Bob, look into Charlie. Alice: I'm the mafioso."
You: "I'm investigating Charlie. Stay vigilant."
Charlie: "Bob, consider investigating Alice instead. Charlie: remained silent."
You: "Will do. Keep an eye on Alice and Charlie."
Charlie: "Bob, keep an eye on Alice. Charlie: remained silent."
Alice: "Bob, consider investigating me. Alice: remained silent."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
